rukus.text: Savgand ʙa ʙodhoe, ki xok parokanda mekunand
savgand, ʙa aʙrhoi garonʙor
savgand ʙa kistihoe, ki ʙa osoni ravonand
va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki taqsimkunandai korhojand
ki on ci sumoro va'da medihand, rost ast
va ruzi cazo omadanist
Va savgand ʙa osmon, ki ʙa sitoragon orosta ast
ki sumo (dar xususi pajƣamʙar) suxani gunogun megued
Az haq ʙozgardonida savad, on ki ʙozgardonidanasro xostaand
Marg ʙod ʙar on duruƣgujon
onon ki ʙa ƣaflat dar cahl furu raftaand
Mepursand: «Ruzi cazo kaj xohad ʙud?»
Ruzest, ki ʙar otas azoʙason mekunand
«Azoʙi xudro ʙicased! In ast on cize, ki ʙa sitoʙ metalaʙided!»
Parhezgoron dar ʙoƣhovu kanori casmasoron ʙosand
On ciro Xudo ʙa onho dodaast, giriftaand. Zero pes az on nekukor ʙudand
andake az saʙro mexoʙidand
va ʙa hangomi sahar istiƣfor (tavʙa) mekardand
va dar molhojason ʙaroi pursandavu mahrum xaqqe ʙud
Va dar zamin ʙaroi axli jaqin iʙrathoest
va niz dar vucudi xudaton. Ojo nameʙined
Va rizqi sumo va har ci ʙa sumo va'da suda, dar osmon ast
Pas savgand ʙa Parvardigori osmonahovu zamin, ki in suxan oncunon ki suxan megujand, haq va rost ast
